Text:
I can't believe there aren't more people downloading this.. :/
A classic must have.. The Blu-ray release took forever..

If anyone's curious about WarGames DVD vs BR.
DVD: http://image.bayimg.com/oabodaaeg.jpg
BR: http://image.bayimg.com/oaboeaaeg.jpg

The quality may be different than the actual disc release, because of DVD, MKV, and JPG compressions. But the sizes are the same. Screen caps were taken using VLC.
